projects.title: Weather API
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all weather for all cities, states and countries.

projects.title: To-Do List
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my skills. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows To-Do on front-end only. This was also my first project in React framework. I've learned a lot!
